title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, such as a .properties file, the system encounters an issue.
OB: The synchronization process fails, and an error message is displayed.
EB: The system should successfully synchronize a .java file with another resource, like a .properties file, without encountering errors.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
